verbs.description: hannah davis hannah davis [V: storytelling] [ARG0: philosophy] is simple every person story contains profound lessons for all whether it a police officer who wears wigs to connect with kids on his beat or a family fighting for justice after their father was killed hannah believes these stories can enlighten us all about what it means to be alive hannah hannah davis
